Name: Night Catcher
About the game: First person view horror game. You are the cop, who fell asleep in his office. Waking up, you learn of some psychopath who craves for your death and informs of this through notes. Try to get out of the police station avoiding meeting the robot guard. Leave the police station as soon as possible.
